companies.2: JANN (Jovenes ayudando a ni&ntildeas y ni&ntildeos)

work_experiences.0: Developed a full-stack web application oriented to keep track of their patients' health and examination procedures
work_experiences.1: Worked on the design of wireframes and system requirements of the web site of their branch Banco de Empleos Guadalajara
work_experiences.2: Free Math tutoring to kids from elementary and middle school

hobbies_notes.0: Twice a week, trying to pick up my old habit
hobbies_notes.1: Love to read/watch action, comedy and romance stories
hobbies_notes.2: Been enjoying it since I was a kid, almost any kind
hobbies_notes.3: 4 times a week, always trying to improve

trip_0.name: Toronto, Canada
trip_0.description: Visited Toronto, Canada and other cities as part of my younger sister's birthday celebration. This vacation lasted for a week
